item.title: [Native] - Mail alerts module - Customer notifications - Enable/Disable product availability
item.description: [Native] - Mail alerts module - Customer notifications - Enable/Disable product availability Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_emailalerts The module page list should be displayed and Mail alerts module should be displayed on the list Click on “Configure” button at the right of the module * The “Configure” page is displayed
